column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I tried the gyoza which was pretty good
column2: it was small but flavorful and warm. Now on to the main dish the ramen! It is easily the best I've had here in town. The ramen was cooked well
column3: the pork was tender with a good amount of fat but was a little bit cold even after submerging it in the broth. My soft boiled egg was cooked perfect and biting into it while drinking the broth made me shed a tear how flavorful it all was.
